body_html: Meh, I just don't like unconditionally printing to stderr, because it usually ends up polluting all of my output that I care about. Perhaps we could guard that with an env variable (JIT_DEBUG), and maybe we can discuss the scope of shape prop in the next meeting? Pretty much all our current difficulty comes from the need to infer strides in the same way ops change them, but those rules are pretty complex. Maybe we should limit certain parts to shape inference only, and allow having TensorTypes without stride info?

body: Meh, I just don't like unconditionally printing to stderr, because it usually ends up polluting all of my output that I care about. Perhaps we could guard that with an env variable (`JIT_DEBUG`), and maybe we can discuss the scope of shape prop in the next meeting? Pretty much all our current difficulty comes from the need to infer strides in the same way ops change them, but those rules are pretty complex. Maybe we should limit certain parts to shape inference only, and allow having `TensorType`s without stride info?
